item.title: Trade fight is an opportunity to invest in emerging markets, including China, Ariel's Phillpotts says
item.description: Exported goods from China to the U.S. are only a small percentage of Beijing's GDP.

item.title: These overbought stocks could be due for a pause
item.description: CNBC Pro identified the most overbought and oversold stocks by weighing their 14-day relative strength index, or RSI.

item.title: Berkshire meeting 'bazaar' features Buffett Squishmallows, 60th anniversary book and giant claw machine
item.description: The conglomerate's yearly convention kicked off Friday with a shareholder-only shopping event, called the "Berkshire Bazaar of Bargains."

item.title: These are Morningstar's top-rated dividend ETFs in 2025
item.description: Investors seeking income have several high-quality options in dividend-paying exchange-traded funds, according to Morningstar.
